name: WORLD SWITCHER
description:
World Switcher

it's action filled world changing fun.

Use your ability to change between worlds and defeat enemies with a fast dashing ability.... and watch them blow into blood.

Can you go trough this hard challenge and find the end....?

Try this amazing action-packed and fast paced platforming action game made for the United Game Jam. See if you can fight your way to the end and meet the final boss....

Theme: Two

Two worlds that you have to switch between.

Controls

WASD to move

Space to jump and double jump.

Q to change world

Press on enemy to dash

But most importantly HAVE FUN
